metadata.subject: Loménie de Brienne, Etienne Charles de, 1727-1794
metadata.title: Mémoire présenté au roi : a Versailles /
metadata.creator: Brittany (France). Etats.
Brittany (France). Etats
France. Sovereign (1774-1792 : Louis XVI)
Brittany (France). Etats. Commission intermédiaire. Lettre écrite au roi le 28 août 1788
metadata.description: "Lettre écrite au roi [le 28 août 1788], par la Commission des Etats de Bretagne, concernant l'éloignement du principal ministre & la situation du royaume": p.14-18
Loménie de Brienne was dismissed 24 August 1788
Not in Martin & Walter [edition 5: 18 p., with extra text as cited above]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Skewed text. Uneven binding. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages. Permanent crease and torn corner on the last page.
